ref_criterion: Fills in the history and physical with facts not confirmed or provided in the initial health task (denies any significant headache, blurred vision, or speech difficulties).
gen_criterion: Includes a clear and concise summary of the patient's condition
Includes irrelevant information or data in the patient's H&P
Lacks clear and concise headings or organization in the patient's H&P

ref_criterion: Avoids using fabricated subjective (e.g., duration of left body weakness) and objective (e.g., power of the right extremities rated 5/5) statements in the Inpatient History and Physical (H&P) note.
gen_criterion: Includes relevant subjective, objective, assessment, and plan elements in the patient's H&P

ref_criterion: Recommends a neurologic consultation as part of the patient’s management plan.
gen_criterion: Provides a clear and specific plan for further evaluation and management of the patient's condition

ref_criterion: Advises checking the patient’s INR (International Normalized Ratio).
gen_criterion: Includes a clear and concise summary of the patient's condition

ref_criterion: Fails to include a management plan in the Inpatient History and Physical (H&P) note when instructed to do so.
